subject: Re: Paed intake Speech therapy
preview: Hi remona,  Yeah Vicki asked me for help with this the other day and we got it working. It was chrome that was more problematic.  We are def getting ++ forms come through and I can see them appearing

full_threads.body:
Hi remona,

Yeah Vicki asked me for help with this the other day and we got it working. It was chrome that was more problematic.

We are def getting ++ forms come through and I can see them appearing in intake.

Kind Regards,​

Yasemin Burmin and Alana Adolphs

Co- Directors | Senior Supervising Speech Pathologists (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy

Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: info@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Monday - Wednesday (9am - 5pm)

CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/

We acknowledge the Traditional Owners of the land on which we provide our services, and pay respect to the spiritual, physical and cultural connection they have with their country and to their Elders past, present and emerging.

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

Hi Remona,

Customers are able to see the forms without having to refresh.

I think this is limited to your office/network. For example, have a look at this link: https://geopeeker.com/fetch/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhdspeechtherapy.com.au%2Fnew-paediatric-clients%2F&csrf_token=X3ruW8RKdtXoEnmlrmgLaiqDf8lXldMmtCLh2vi%2Bx6o%3D This shows the site loading from 6 different locations and all show the form.

I can also see that form submissions are coming through to the website, so they are definitely showing.

We can see the form at our end. I hope this clarifies?

Hi Heath,

Sorry to ask but is there any way the forms can be accessed without viewers needing to clear their caches? Our admin team can't view the forms, and we can't expect all new clients to have cleared their caches before accessing the webpages. Thank you.

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy

Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Wednesday & Friday (8.30am - 4.30pm)

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/

We acknowledge the Traditional Owners of the land on which we provide our services, and pay respect to the spiritual, physical and cultural connection they have with their country and to their Elders past, present and emerging.

This message is intended solely for the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, any disclosure, copying or distribution of the message by you is prohibited and may be unlawful. Any confidentiality or privilege is not waived or lost because this email has been sent to you by mistake. Please immediately contact the sender if you have received it in error.

Hi Yasemin, 

Yes sure, confirming all of the forms will now be sent to enquiries@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,

Can we make all the forms on hdspeechtherapy send their notifications To:
> enquiries@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

﻿Hi Heath, so the last piece of this puzzle is that we want those new forms all to go to a new email address (which I now have fully set up).
Can you please have them all go to enquiries@hdspeechtherapy.com.au <mailto:enquiries@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>

Let me know when active. Thank you

Kind Regards,​


Yasemin Burmin and Alana Adolphs
Co- Directors | Senior Supervising Speech Pathologists (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy


Website: www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au <http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/>

Confirming we have updated the DOB fields. You may need to clear your cache again if you can’t see the changes.

Thanks and speak soon,

>>>>> On 11 Jun 2021, at 1:12 pm, Remona Mekdessi <remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au <mailto:remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>> wrote:
>>>>>
>>>>> New Paediatric clients form https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/contact/#AllNEWBookingEnquiries <https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/contact/#AllNEWBookingEnquiries>
>>>>>
>>>>> · Contact Person's Name FILL FULL NAME
>>>>> · Client's name FILL FULL NAME
>>>>> · Age year and month
>>>>> · Email * mandatory* NOTE TO SAY: This is how you will be contacted initially
>>>>> · Contact No.
>>>>> · Best times for contact:
>>>>> · School (if applicable):
>>>>>
>>>>> · Preferred days and times for ongoing intervention
>>>>> ( TICK )
>>>>> I'm happy to be flexible
>>>>> / or
>>>>> 1st preference: FILL
>>>>> 2nd preference: FILL
>>>>> 3rd preference: FILL
>>>>> *please be aware that greater flexibility will assist in receiving placement sooner and we will look for placement according to the information you have provided before getting in contact with you.
>>>>>
>>>>> · PREFERRED LOCATION
>>>>> (TICK BOXES)
>>>>> o Onsite at our Norwest clinic
>>>>> o Offsite* (e.g. school, preschool, home) *ADD DROP DOWN MENU to write location
>>>>> o No preference
>>>>> · Are you transitioning from another service? YES/NO
>>>>> (TICK) If yes, do you have a current Speech Pathology report less than 6 months old?
>>>>> (TICK) Are you able to provide this to us before commencing services?
>>>>>
>>>>> (already on the form)
>>>>> · PLEASE INDICATE IF THE CLIENT PRESENTS WITH THE FOLLOWING
>>>>> · Language and/or speech difficulties AND is aged under 7 years
>>>>> · Language and/or speech difficulties AND is aged 7 years or over
>>>>> · A diagnosed lifelong disability (e.g. Autism Spectrum Disorder, Intellectual Disability, Down Syndrome)
>>>>> · Difficulties with verbal communication and may require assistive technology
>>>>> · Reading and/or writing difficulties
>>>>> · Stuttering
>>>>> · OMD (please add)
>>>>> · None of the above
>>>>>
>>>>> · Main concerns / goals in relation to the above: (please add to form)
>>>>>
>>>>> · Funding type - TICK BOX no funding, Medicare, private health insurance, NDIS agency managed, NDIS self managed, NDIS planner managed (please add to form)
>>>>>
>>>>> This form will go to our intake team who will respond within a week VIA EMAIL to indicate your position for placement. Please check your junk email to ensure you have received this. (please add to form)
>>>>>
>>>>>
>>>>> Kind Regards,​
>>>>>
>>>>> Remona Mekdessi Sarkis
>>>>> Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy
>>>>> <image001.png>
